name: 紅蜘蛛外伝：暗戦
description: 紅蜘蛛外伝：暗戦(Red Spider Anecdote: Triangle) is a Hong Kong Noir style Visual Novel.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows Server 2008, Windows 7, Windows 8.1 Classic or Windows 10 Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 1280x720 display (1280x1024 recommended) with 16-bit video card Storage: 350 MB available space Additional Notes: Adobe AIR application
